summary: During World War I, the star-crossed affair of an underage French student with a woman engaged to a soldier.
cast: Micheline Presle|Gérard Philipe|Denise Grey|Jean Debucourt|Palau|Jean Lara|Michel François|Richard Francoeur|Max Maxudian|Germaine Ledoyen|Jeanne Pérez|Jacques Tati|André Bervil|Edmond Beauchamp|Charles Vissières|Henri Gaultier|Jean Relet|Marthe Mellot|Renée García|Albert Michel|Albert Rémy|Jean Berton|Raymond Destac|Jean Fleury|Albert Glado|Léon Larive|Jacques Beauvais|Roger Vieuille|Maurice Lagrenée|Paulin Vieyra
title: El diablo y la dama
